parameter.name: period
parameter.label: Period
parameter.description: Time in milliseconds between successive triggers

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The Nikobus address of the module

parameter.name: duration
parameter.label: Duration
parameter.description: Duration in seconds required for a rollershutter to get from open to closed

parameter.name: delay
parameter.label: Delay
parameter.description: Delay specifying how many seconds after duration module's output is set to OFF. Defaults to 5 seconds

parameter.name: reverse
parameter.label: Reverse Direction
parameter.description: Reverse direction of rollershutters. Defaults to false
